languages.text: Вам не хватает металлолома, чтобы починить корабль, но вы все еще можете провести ремонт — для этого необходимо пожертвовать улучшением корабля. В меню управления кораблем выберите компонент, уровень которого можно уменьшить. Кликните на нем [ЛКМ] и выберите "Разобрать" — компонент будет частично разобран на детали, которые отправятся в {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}металлолом{/g}, а вы сможете починить корабль.

You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades. Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.
languages.original_text: Вам не хватает металлолома, чтобы починить корабль, но вы все еще можете провести ремонт — для этого необходимо пожертвовать улучшением корабля. В меню управления кораблем выберите компонент, уровень которого можно уменьшить. Кликните на нем [ЛКМ] и выберите "Разобрать" — компонент будет частично разобран на детали, которые отправятся в {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}металлолом{/g}, а вы сможете починить корабль.

traits.locale_text: You do not have enough readily available scrap to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades. Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select Downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades. Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades. Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

languages.text: 目前，您并没有足够{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}来修理舰船。不过，如果您愿意牺牲舰船的部分升级功能的话，就有足够的资源修理舰船了。 打开虚空舰管理界面，选择任意组件。点击鼠标左键，选择降级。在这之后，该组件的当前等级便会降低。该组件会从舰船上拆卸下来，变成废料的一部分，您可以用这些废料来修理舰船。
languages.original_text: You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades. Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

traits.locale_text: 目前，您并没有足够{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}来修理舰船。不过，如果您愿意牺牲舰船的部分升级功能的话，就有足够的资源修理舰船了。 打开虚空舰管理界面，选择任意组件。点击鼠标左键，选择降级。在这之后，该组件的当前等级便会降低。该组件会从舰船上拆卸下来，变成废料的一部分，您可以用这些废料来修理舰船。

languages.text: すぐに船の修理ができるだけの{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}がなくても、船のアップグレードの一部を消費してもいい場合はまだ選択肢は残されている。 ヴォイドシップ管理画面を開き、部品を選択する。[LMB] をクリックしてダウングレードを選択。部品が船からはがされて予備のスクラップ（最初に投資した一部）に変わると、現在の部品レベルが下がる。これを使って船の修理をすることができる。
languages.original_text: You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades. Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

traits.locale_text: すぐに船の修理ができるほど{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}がなくても、船のアップグレードの一部を消費してもよければまだ選択肢は残されている。 ヴォイドシップ管理画面を開き、部品を選択する。その上で [LMB] をクリックして、ダウングレードを選択。部品が船からはがされ予備のスクラップ（最初に投資した一部）に変わると、現在の部品レベルが下がる。これを使って船の修理をすることができる。

languages.text: No tienes suficiente {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} para reparar la nave, pero tienes otras opciones si no te importa sacrificar algunas mejoras de la nave. Abre la pantalla de gestión de la nave del vacío y escoge un componente. Pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] y selecciona desmejorar. El nivel del componente actual se reducirá al arrancarlo de la nave y convertirlo en chatarra (recuperas parte de lo invertido) con la que reparar la nave.
languages.original_text: You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades. Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

traits.locale_text: No tienes suficiente {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g} para reparar la nave, pero tienes otras opciones si no te importa sacrificar algunas mejoras de la nave. Abre la pantalla de gestión de la nave del vacío y escoge un componente. Pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] y selecciona desmejorar. El nivel del componente actual se reducirá al arrancarlo de la nave y convertirlo en chatarra (recuperas parte de lo invertido) con la que reparar la nave.

languages.text: Du hast nicht genügend {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g}, um dein Schiff zu reparieren, aber du kannst dafür immer noch einige Upgrades deines Schiffes opfern. Rufe den Raumschiffverwaltungsbildschirm auf und wähle eine Komponente aus. Klicke mit [LMB] darauf und wähle Downgrade aus. Die aktuelle Komponentenstufe wird gesenkt, da sie aus dem Schiff entfernt und in Ersatzschrott umgewandelt wird — ein Teil der ursprünglichen Investition -, der für die Reparatur deines Schiffes verwendet werden kann.
languages.original_text: You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades. Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

traits.locale_text: Du hast nicht gen[gend {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g}, um dein Schiff zu reparieren, aber du kannst dafür immer noch einige Upgrades deines Schiffes opfern. Rufe den Raumschiffverwaltungsbildschirm auf und wähle eine Komponente aus. Klicke mit der [LMB] darauf und wähle Downgrade aus. Die aktuelle Komponentenstufe wird gesenkt, da sie aus dem Schiff entfernt und in Ersatzschrott umgewandelt wird — ein Teil der ursprünglichen Investition -, der für die Reparatur deines Schiffes verwendet werden kann.

languages.text: Vous n'avez pas assez de {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} pour réparer votre vaisseau, mais vous disposez de plusieurs options si vous acceptez de sacrifier quelques améliorations. Ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau spatial et choisissez un composant. Cliquez dessus avec le [BGS] et sélectionnez Rétrograder. Le niveau actuel du composant sera abaissé au fur et à mesure qu'il sera retiré du vaisseau et transformé en pièces de récupération (une partie de l'investissement initial) pour permettre la réparation de votre vaisseau.
languages.original_text: You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades. Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.

traits.locale_text: Vous n'avez pas assez de {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g} pour réparer votre vaisseau, mais vous disposez de plusieurs options si vous acceptez de sacrifier quelques améliorations. Ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau spatial et choisissez un composant. Cliquez dessus avec le [BGS] et sélectionnez Rétrograder. Le niveau actuel du composant sera abaissé au fur et à mesure qu'il sera retiré du vaisseau et transformé en pièces de récupération (une partie de l'investissement initial) pour permettre la réparation de votre vaisseau.

languages.text: Gemini onarabilmen için hazırda yeterince {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}hurdan{/g} bulunmuyor ancak geminin terfi ettirdiğin bazı kısımlarını feda etmeye göze aldıysan hâlâ seçeneğin mevcut. Uçsuz gemisi yönetimi ekranını aç ve bir bileşen seç. Sol fare tuşuyla üzerine tıkla ve terfiyi sök komutunu seç. Bileşen, gemiden sökülürken mevcut seviyesi düşecek ve gemini onarmakta kullanabileceğin yedek hurdaya (terfide kullandığın hurdanın yalnızca belirli bir kısmı) dönüşecektir.
languages.original_text: You do not have enough readily available {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} to repair your ship, but you still have options if you are willing to sacrifice some of your ship's upgrades. Open the voidship management screen and choose a component. Click [LMB] on it and select downgrade. The current level of the component will be lowered as it is stripped from the ship and turned into spare scrap — a portion of the original investment — that can be used to repair your ship.
